title: Subjective Evaluation of Video Generation Quality
instructions:
Please watch each video and rate the videos based on Four evaluation metrics,
         1. Prompt following: How well does the video follow the prompt
         2. Motion Quality: Whether the motion in the video is smooth and natural
         3. Camera Move: Whether the video present the camera move in a natural way
         4. Overall: Overall quality of the video
     Please rate each video on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 is the lowest and 5 is the highest

groups.prompt: On a theater stage, from extremely dark to have some light on the wall, dark studio, rim lighting, two tone lighting, dimly lit.
captions:
1. Very poor: Does not follow the prompt at all
            2. Poor: Barely follows the prompt
            3. Fair: Somewhat follows the prompt
            4. Good: Mostly follows the prompt
            5. Excellent: Perfectly follows the prompt
1. Very poor: Motion is extremely choppy
            2. Poor: Motion is not smooth
            3. Fair: Motion is somewhat smooth
            4. Good: Motion is smooth but not flawless
            5. Excellent: Motion is perfectly smooth
1. Very poor: Camera movement is unnatural
            2. Poor: Camera movement is awkward
            3. Fair: Camera movement is acceptable
            4. Good: Camera movement is natural but not perfect
            5. Excellent: Camera movement is perfectly natural
1. Very poor: Overall quality is unacceptable
            2. Poor: Overall quality is below average
            3. Fair: Overall quality is average
            4. Good: Overall quality is above average
            5. Excellent: Overall quality is outstanding
